name: Roadtrip!
description:
Roadtrip! A game taking place in the 1960s, It's your job to drive for a full hour to win!

Features Include:

  • A 1960 ford with a broken steering wheel.
  • Day-night cycle.
  • A sky with clouds and stars at night.
  • Cactus?!
  • Interactable radio with 4 songs!

Instructions: W to accelerate, A to move left, D to move right, and don't drive off-road (or else?)

Inspired by Desert Bus.
